div.a: A Sound Collage Featuring Musicians Who Died In 2012

div.div: From Etta James to Donna Summer.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10nzXVe&via=Digg&text=A Sound Collage Featuring Musicians Who Died In 2012

div.div: Dubai's Burj Khalifa is the tallest free-standing structure in the world. It also has a serious sewage problem

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12NOJnY&via=Digg&text=World’s Tallest (And Smelliest) Building

div.a: Airliner Crashing Onto Moscow Highway Caught On Car Camera

div.div: The Saturday crash of a Red Wings Airlines Tupolev Tu-204 was captured by the dashboard-mounted camera of a car that happened to be at the wrong place at the wrong time.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TQrO9W&via=Digg&text=Airliner Crashing Onto Moscow Highway Caught On Car Camera

div.a: The Great Arctic Cyclone Of 2012 Really Was Impressive

div.div: The storm helped break up sea ice, causing a new record low.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10wRIkY&via=Digg&text=The Great Arctic Cyclone Of 2012 Really Was Impressive

div.a: 17 New Ideas That Are Actually Worth Millions

div.div: Kickstarter is a place where entrepreneurs and artists can post ideas and raise money from other users. Before 2012, no project had ever raised $1 million on the platform. In the last 12 months, 17 projects exceeded 9-figure fundraises on Kickstarter.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Yut4w3&via=Digg&text=17 New Ideas That Are Actually Worth Millions

div.a: The Bright Side Of Falling Off The Fiscal Cliff

div.div: Why you shouldn't listen to all of the hysteria on TV.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VnQvZO&via=Digg&text=The Bright Side Of Falling Off The Fiscal Cliff

div.div: HINT: YOU PROBABLY HAVEN'T SEEN IT

div.a: What Is The Most Illegally Downloaded Film In The World?

div.div: No one saw the film on the big screen, but in illegal downloads it beats both The Avengers and Dark Knight.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZGVmd0&via=Digg&text=What Is The Most Illegally Downloaded Film In The World?

div.a: How Did Humans Develop Lactose Tolerance?

div.div: Got milk? Ancient European farmers who made cheese thousands of years ago certainly had it. But at that time, they lacked a genetic mutation that would have allowed them to digest raw milk's dominant sugar, lactose, after childhood.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U5QBmO&via=Digg&text=How Did Humans Develop Lactose Tolerance?

div.a: Why Do Rich People Wear Monocles?

div.div: Monocles have been the chosen eyewear of our cartoon rich people for a long time now. But how did the monocle become synonymous with rich?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W9lIwu&via=Digg&text=Why Do Rich People Wear Monocles?

div.a: Will A Robot Take Your Job?

div.div: Slowly, but surely, robots (and virtual ’bots that exist only as software) are taking over our jobs; according to one back-of-the-envelope projection, in ninety years “70 percent of today’s occupations will likewise be replaced by automation.” Should we be worried?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UsZsA7&via=Digg&text=Will A Robot Take Your Job?

div.div: KEEPING UP WITH THE JONESES' STATUS UPDATE

div.a: Why Facebook Makes Me Feel Like A Loser

div.div: Your friends are always flying off somewhere exotic, and buying new cars, and having exciting careers. You just sit in your underwear wondering if visiting Vimeo rather than YouTube counts as a life changing experience...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TNJVO3&via=Digg&text=Why Facebook Makes Me Feel Like A Loser

div.a: Rogue Radio Station Caused Keyless Entry Systems To Fail, Left Car Owners Locked Out

div.div: For months, frustrated car owners just couldn't explain it. Parking anywhere in the vicinity of the Hollywood Police Department would render their vehicle's keyless entry system useless.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12UGOV1&via=Digg&text=Rogue Radio Station Caused Keyless Entry Systems To Fail, Left Car Owners Locked Out

div.a: Site Offers Solutions To Your First World Problems

div.div: If you have a “first world problem” to be solved, Firehed has got you covered in the site, First World Problems, where several Silicon Valley sites are offered as the answer to your problems.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UyPr5u&via=Digg&text=Site Offers Solutions To Your First World Problems

div.a: Like Math? Thank Your Motivation, Not Your IQ

div.div: Looks like Tiger Mom had it half-right: Motivation to work hard and good study techniques, not IQ, lead to better math skills, a new study shows.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YXH0Ui&via=Digg&text=Like Math? Thank Your Motivation, Not Your IQ

div.div: The best stories about the absolute worst diseases.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TJmN3b&via=Digg&text=Pandemics Porn

div.a: Pixar Animator Dreams Up A New Superhero — For Each Day Of The Year

div.div: Most people think losing 10 pounds is an ambitious New Year's resolution, but Pixar artist Everett Downing set out to create 365 brand-new superheroes in one year

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TojKee&via=Digg&text=Pixar Animator Dreams Up A New Superhero — For Each Day Of The Year

div.a: How Facebook Is Hunting Down And Deleting Fake Accounts

div.div: The fake like/fake account issue has been a years long headache at Facebook. Even though the actual rate of questionable activity on Facebook is a small percentage of its entire traffic, it harms the social network's reputation.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YutFh2&via=Digg&text=How Facebook Is Hunting Down And Deleting Fake Accounts

div.a: Drivers Enjoy Running Turtles Over, Experiment Shows

div.div: It sounds like the start of a joke: “Why did the turtle cross the road?” But this would be a quite dark joke indeed; the turtle in question would be lucky to even see the other side of the road before it was crushed.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZErGwX&via=Digg&text=Drivers Enjoy Running Turtles Over, Experiment Shows

div.div: THE BEST WAY TO START YOUR DAY

div.a: The Anti-Masturbation Crusade That Launched A Cereal Empire

div.div: During the 18th and 19th centuries, the Western world worked itself up into a mass hissy fit over the idea of people touching themselves. In the young United States, one of the most ardent anti-masturbaters was a Michigan physician named John Harvey Kellogg.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZGnVqL&via=Digg&text=The Anti-Masturbation Crusade That Launched A Cereal Empire

div.a: A Complete History Of American Nuclear Explosions In 90 Seconds

div.div: This is a sample from every single recorded test conducted by the US, until these tests were banned by international treaty in 1963. Then we just started doing them underground, instead.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UykL4j&via=Digg&text=A Complete History Of American Nuclear Explosions In 90 Seconds

div.div: A home video allegedly taken just before Christmas during a late-night flight appears to show a UFO flying next to the plane. The video, posted to YouTube by a man named Mauricio Ruiz, has the Internet buzzing.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YtKEQA&via=Digg&text='UFO' Videotaped From Airplane

div.a: FAA Doesn't Make You Sit Down Before Your Plane Leaves -- Your Airline Does

div.div: Most flyers who are used to having to be in their seats before the doors are closed probably thought the Federal Aviation Administration demanded it. That's not the case.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TOeNxN&via=Digg&text=FAA Doesn't Make You Sit Down Before Your Plane Leaves -- Your Airline Does

div.a: America’s 'Milk Cliff' Will Take The Country Back To 1949

div.div: We’ve lamented the US Congress’ failure to do anything particularly constructive in the last two years, but the latest example really takes the cake, or at least takes away the milk you might enjoy with your cake.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U76rxL&via=Digg&text=America’s 'Milk Cliff' Will Take The Country Back To 1949

div.a: The Coolest Way To Put Out A Boat Fire

div.div: In case you're ever around a boat fire, here's the coolest way to be a good samaritan.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WYb2GY&via=Digg&text=The Coolest Way To Put Out A Boat Fire
